true relation. And I tell you for the tenth time that if the letter to the Emperor and the will in Pierre's favor are among the count's papers, then, my dear girl, you and your sisters are not heiressesl If you don't believe me, then believe an expert. I have just been talking to Dmitri Oniifrich" (the family solicitor) "and he says the same."
